currentMembers.name: Anthony Kiedis
currentMembers.biography: Anthony Kiedis is the lead vocalist and primary lyricist of RHCP. He has been with the band since its inception in 1983.

currentMembers.name: Michael 'Flea' Balzary
currentMembers.biography: Flea is the bassist and co-founding member of RHCP, known for his energetic performances and distinctive playing style.

currentMembers.name: John Frusciante
currentMembers.biography: John Frusciante is known for his unique guitar style and has had multiple stints with the band.

currentMembers.name: Chad Smith
currentMembers.biography: Chad Smith joined RHCP in 1988 and is known for his powerful drumming style and technical proficiency.

formerMembers.name: Hillel Slovak
formerMembers.biography: Original guitarist who tragically passed away in 1988.

formerMembers.name: Jack Irons
formerMembers.biography: Original drummer who left the band after Slovak's death.

formerMembers.name: Josh Klinghoffer
formerMembers.biography: Replaced John Frusciante in 2009 and played with the band until Frusciante's return in 2019.

awards.name: Grammy Award
awards.category: Best Rock Performance by a Duo or Group with Vocal

awards.name: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame
